metadata.title: CVE-2023-0469 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free flaw was found in io_uring/filetable.c inio_install_fixed_file in the io_uring subcomponent in the Linux Kernelduring call cleanup. This flaw may lead to a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-19-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-5.13.0-19-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-generic-64k - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-lowlatency - 5.13.0-19.19
No subscription required

No subscription required
